sqlMap.select: SELECT task_log_id as taskLogId, task_id as taskId, update_by as updateBy, task_field as taskField, task_old_value as taskOldValue, task_new_value as taskNewValue, update_date as updateDate, REPLACE(REPLACE(remarks, chr(10), ''), chr(13), '') as remarks, change_type as changeType, fGetGeneralCodeCaption(change_type) as changeTypeCaption FROM task_log WHERE task_id IN ( SELECT task_id FROM task WHERE project_id = #projectId# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM task_log WHERE task_id IN ( SELECT task_id FROM task WHERE project_id = #projectId#)
